field.name: summary
field.value: More significative exception message when container cannot instantiate components

field.name: description
field.value:
I had a component with several dependencies and the container could not instantiate it, reporting this message (in Italian, but I guess you can understand anyway):
System.ArgumentNullException: Il valore non può essere null. Nome parametro: types
After checking through all the dependencies I found out that I had simply made its constructor protected. A more meaningful message would have brought me right to the point.

comment.author: alwin
comment.text: This patch ensures a proper exception message, mentioning the need for a public constructor. Also has test case for it.
